divs: sighting detailsi'm a meteorologist so i frequently step outside to check the sky conditions - while doing so - i saw a bright white light roughly twice the size of the background stars behind it. it was traveling at the speed of a jet aircraft at high altitude (as witnessed from the ground) from northwest to southeast. at first i thought it was a plane - but it had no navigation lights and made no sound i could hear. the sky was clear and i had a good view of the object. it moved accross the sky away from me for aprox. 2 1\2 minutes - then turned red - and dissapeared as if it had simply blinked out of existance. i felt dissapointed that i didn't have an opportunity to see it in more detail.
Summary: White light traversing the sky - dissapeared.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around July 9th 2010
